data.actual_result: In the first case the toast is dark with white text and in second case it's white with black text
data.expected_result: They should be exactly the same
data.short_description: Toast isn't the same color between case where friend request input is invalid and case where user hasn't been found
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Friends tab - Tap Add a Friend icon - Input random characters and submit - Observe toast - Now input a username that doesn't exist but is in valid format (e.g `user#0000`) - Observe toast again
